entry.summary:
Author: LuthienLuinwe

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,102Chapters: 23/30Kudos: 299

entry.title: Super Pride
entry.summary:
Author: sillywittlerabbit

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 779Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 14

Summary: It's Pride Month in the DC Universe, and everyone is doing something different this month. For some, they've just recently discovered this new part of themselves, and so celebrating Pride is new occurrence. For others who have known about this part of themselves for a while, celebrating Pride is just another tradition. One thing is for sure, none of these characters are celebrating Pride on their own.

entry.title: Turbulence
entry.summary:
Author: LuthienLuinwe

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,903Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 119

Summary: After a soul-crushing breakup, Hal Jordan’s brilliant solution is to flee to Gotham City—because what better place to forget your problems than the crime capital of America?New city, new apartment, no ex-girlfriend. Perfect plan!Except Bruce Wayne keeps appearing everywhere like a judgmental shadow. Meanwhile, Hal’s determined to prove he’s handling his breakup like an adult while Bruce is equally determined to prove Hal is a disaster with a ring.When Hal’s emotional avoidance collides with Bruce’s emotional constipation, both heroes discover there are some things even they can’t outrun or out-brood.

entry.title: The List
entry.summary:
Author: Butterfly_Wordsmith

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,258Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 249

Summary: Batman really thought he was doing the right thing when he came up with The List, a written document for each member of the Justice League to pre-approve a list of people to have sex with should they ever be under the influence of sex-pollen or any similar circumstance which would put them in a fuck or die situation.He just never expected to be on so many people's lists. Nor did he expect to be called upon so often- or to have so many feelings about it.Or to fall in love in the process.Neither did Clark, who wants more than just a turn to be saved by Batman's sexual availability- something so obvious to the rest of the League it's almost painful. Too bad they want him, too.Ch 1 BatLantern PollenCh 2 Aquabat SlimeCh 3 SuperWonderBat AphrodisiacCh 4 BatFlash GasCh 5 BatArrow ?Ch 6 Superbat ?

entry.title: baby you're a haunted house
entry.summary:
Author: magnolia_cowboy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,111Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 76

Summary: The Spectre's newest host, former Green Lantern Hal Jordan, secretly visits the Watchtower, thinking he has the place to himself. Unfortunately, his ex-coworker thinks the same. “Bruce?” Bruce stiffens in his chair at the sound of the voice. The constant echoing of his name means it can only be one person. “Jordan,” he growls out, standing from his chair. He hovers one hand over a weapon at his belt, ready to incapacitate the man if he makes a move. “Spectre,” he corrects himself. Hal Jordan is dead and has been for a long time. “What the hell are you doing here?”

entry.title: Total lack of recall
entry.summary:
Author: BoredomBeckons

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,199Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 160

Summary: In the early days of the Justice League the team are unsure if they can trust Batman without knowing his identity. A device borrowed from the Lanterns allow them to ease their doubts without invading his privacy.The user will enter a non-corporeal state for seven days so they can follow their target, see and hear everything they do. When it ends they will forget everything they saw, but whatever opinion they form in that time will remain afterwards. If they see them being kind, they will emerge with a good opinion of them. If they see them being cruel, they will emerge with a poor opinion.The last thing Hal expected was to come out of using the device with a crush.

entry.summary:
Author: Alex_Blanc

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,393Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 100

entry.title: To cage a star
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,748Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 552

Summary: "Excuse me, um... I need to find someone, would you- would you mind helping me?"The lady who is asked is an old woman at a bus stop, with a warm expression on her face."Yes, dear, who are you looking for?""Um..." The little girl in the pale green dress reaches for her small purse and pulls out a carefully kept piece of paper to give the old lady. "His name is written on the back...""And who may this person be to you, dear?""My dad... Mom said Mr. Bruce Wayne is my dad."
